message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand that $120 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $160.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $160 is still a bit too high for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $140.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm now offering the product to you for $155.
I'm really close to making a decision, but I still think $155 is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $152.50
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $160. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make a profit, so I'll stick to my price.
